summary: This is the same Dovahkiin Hideout version 0.9.2 by Shawk only fixed Breezehome crash and added a new spell "Retreat" and other minor stuff.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lime][size=3][b]Description:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]This is Dovahkiin Hideout mod by Shawk with a Breezehome crash fix, new spell and some other stuff listed below.
Original mod[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12553/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12553/?[/url]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Author:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]Shawk (Shawkab on nexus)[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3134617/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3134617/?[/url]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]1.Copy "Data" folder to your Game DIR.
2.Activate "Hideout.esm"[/color]

[color=red][size=3][b]Warning:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=pink]I've tested this on game version 1.9.32.0.8 with and without DLC's and on Legendary version.
You should not go through the secret doors. There's nothing yet but if you really want to look there, save right before and then load your game.
Before trying this mod, make a Big Save and copy of it and only then proceed so you have a backup if anything happens.[/color]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Info:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]Author of Dovahkiin Hideout was inactive since 2012 but it seems he's back. So try to contact him first if you have any questions about Hideout it self.
I've not made any dirty edits and also cleaned this one with TES5EDIT to make sure the file is clear.[/color]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Mods/Fixes:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]"Skyrim Unoffical Legendary Patch" (USLEEP) will grealty smooth your gameplay.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?[/url]

[color=gold]"Mannequin Fix" if your mannequis are wandering around or you just want to control their pose.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10652/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10652/?[/url]

[color=gold]"Sneak Tools" sadly discontinued but if you liked Dark Messiah then this is for you.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19447/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19447/?[/url]

[color=gold]"Lockable Locks" with empty right hand you can lock doors if you have the key to them.[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66917/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66917/?[/url]

[color=lime][size=3][b]ChangeLog:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=aqua]v0.9.2.2[/color]
[color=gold]*Renamed "Thieves Hideout Key" as "Hideout Master Key" and attached to doors leading to: College of Winterhold, Riften Ragged Flagon, Whiterun Jorrvaskr, Hideout Cave, Hideout Dungeon, Hideout Exterior.
*Added key to Bedroom door named "Hideout Bedroom Key" and locked doors with master lock. (Reason why keys are added? I started to use mod "Lockable Locks". Link below.)
*Fixed female mannequin heads.
*Seperated female mannequins with a room and added 10 more of them.
*Mannequins should not wander around. Tested this without Mannequin Fix but USLEEP was active. They change poses still.[/color]

[color=aqua]v0.9.2.1[/color]
[color=gold]*Fixed Whiterun Breezehome crash to desktop (CTD).
*Added Spell called Retreat. With this spell you can teleport to Hideout and back where you were.
*Added doors to Dark Brotherhood in Dawnstar. This was a request.
*Added possibility to Fast Travel from Hideout.[/color]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Permission:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=gold]This mod is not mine so I cannot give you any kind of permissions related to this mod.
Try to contact Shawk.[/color]

[color=lime][size=3][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=aqua]Bethesda[/color][color=gold] for their great game and tools provided.[/color]
[color=aqua]Shawk[/color][color=gold] for making this mod.[/color]
[color=aqua]Borgut1337[/color][color=gold] for giving possibility to learn new spell (retreat in this mod).[/color]

[color=red][size=3][b]Disclaimer:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=pink]I don't take any responsibility for any kind of damage done to your computer, game, save file or anything else.. Use this mod at your own risk! And always make a save game backup before testing any new mod or updating current one.[/color]
author: Shawkab

files.name: Dovahkiin's Hideout v0.9.2.1
files.fileName: Added doors to Dark Brotherhood in Dawnstar and fixed navigation in Breezehome-51817-0-9-2-1.7z
